jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
As one of Gojek's product pillars, Kernel is an evolving platform of tools & services which enable Gojek's engineering teams to manage their code & cloud infrastructure for business scale & reliability with a long term goal of creating a unified engineer toolkit & productivity engine. We create an Interface & Meta Management, Components, Deployments, Monitoring, Data Management, Logging, Identity & Auth, Networking & Security, and more ahead

Kernel Goals
- Make a scalable, reliable, predictable platform
- Design fault tolerant, distributed systems
- Enable engineers to build, test, deploy, monitor, analyse, iterate on their code
- And to manage environments, clusters, workflows, users
- Make engineer on-boarding & learning simpler

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content: • As a member of the Network Engineering team (Platform), your focus is to continuously improve network efficiency /  support and solutions to the Kernel customer base while serving as an advocate for customer needs within the team. Being able to design network solutions and architecture keeping security best practices in mind is a huge plus. As a primary point of contact for customers, you are responsible for facilitating customer relationships with support and providing advice and assistance to internal Go-Jek employees on diverse customer situations and escalated issues. We are looking for someone with advanced chops in core networking as well as SDNs with an inclination towards maintaining infra as code. Google certification is a plus.

• Essential Functions:
  • Design, Plan and Prototype a network.
  • Contribute to mentoring Junior members by creating well documented automation and code.
  • Being able to interact between technical and non-technical teams
  • Equally comfortable with Routers, Firewalls, Linux and Cloud network components.
  • Being able to prioritise between short-term gains and long-term goals.
  • Being able to highlight and resolve network security flaws as per security best practices.
  • Basic Qualifications:
  • 5+ years of Experience
  • Ability to handle mesh networks for cloud and physical components.
  • Thorough with all Layers of Networking
  • Ability to create independent documentation for consumption of varied skilled audience.
  • Thorough with mesh of Linux, VPN, Proxy, BGP
  • Experience with SSO and ACLs ( Kong, SAML, OAUTH etc.)
  • Good to have:
  • Any Cloud networking certification.
  • Other Network related certification.
